DataElement.preferredName: Linear Analogue Self-Assessment Past Week Frequency of Pain Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of the frequency of their pain during the past week, using an eleven point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Linear Analogue Self-Assessment Past Week Frequency of Pain Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy._The most recent week, including today._A question about an individual's frequency of pain._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy.

Concepts.definition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Frequency of Pain Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about an individual's frequency of pain.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about an individual's frequency of pain.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created and released as part of Alliance project. mc 2/27/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings._The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI)_A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No Pain To Constant Pain 11 Range Likert Score 4

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No Pain To Constant Pain 11 Range Likert Score 4
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: Continually recurring or continuing without interruption.: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.: A subjective score of 4 on a Likert scale.

Continually recurring or continuing without interruption.
The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
A subjective score of 4 on a Likert scale.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Pain Frequency Score Integer::11 Point Scale
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.:The number of occurrences of something within a given time period. (NCI):A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: The sensation of discomfort, distress, or agony, resulting from the stimulation of specialized nerve endings.
The number of occurrences of something within a given time period.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
